response.overview: Sound of a Dream is an intimate portrait of Lee Burridge, an underground DJ who has dedicated his life to the pursuit of one dream: to bring people together through music. Told through cinematic storytelling, archival footage, and access to Leeâ€™s inner world, the film tells the story of an artist tirelessly dedicated to his craft over the course of a 40-year career. In that time, Lee has helped to define and evolve a global sound, shaping a generation of listeners.
